title: I don't even know....
body:
So my game is being buggy

I can not:
-ping
-click the item shop, or open with I
-tp without using F or D
-drag and click the white box
-use certain champion ults [ example rek sai]
-ward without dragging it

replies.body:
It sounds like your input settings may be corrupt. I recommend completing a reset with the steps below:

First, you'll want to **log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. ​*Alt+Tab*​ out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Let me know if this helped.

Since the config reset didn't fix it, there may be some local settings or changes that can be made. We'll need you to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our tech specialists so we can investigate further. I recommend running a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and attaching them to your request.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Note: The item shop hotkey is "P" by default. 

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/template_lcu_changelog_1280x720.jpg?itok=uV6zjzTq
